Hello,

Does heritrix do any "liberal-reading" of robots.txt files when
determining if a user agent specified in it is referring to it or does
it take the user agent we configure for it as is?

For example, if a robots.txt file says
User-agent: bot1

and we configure our user agent as:
Mozilla/5.0 (compatible; bot1 +http://myUrl)
will the crawler interpret the bot1 user-agent specified in the file
as referring to it?

Or do we need to specify our user agent like:
bot1 (+http://myUrl)

thanks,
Andrea
